means: [医]放线菌属：放线菌目(order Actinomycetales)放线菌科(family Actinomycetaceae)中的一属革兰氏阳性菌，着色不规律，不产生芽胞，形成分支菌丝，不抗酸，亦不活动

sentence.Network_en: Therefore, it is great important to assess genic polymorphism of Actinomyces.

sentence.Network_en: As indigenous oral bacteria, the Actinomyces are thought to contribute to caries especially to root caries.

list.abs: 【摘要】:正放线菌病是一种少见的慢性化脓性感染性疾病,男性多于女性,人与人或人与动物之间无传染性。以色列放线菌(actinomyces Israeli)是人类感染的主要致病菌.
